verses.text: \w There|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H3477"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* land \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w Uz|strong="H5780"\w* \w whose|strong="H8034"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* Job. \w And|strong="H8034"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w man|strong="H7451"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w blameless|strong="H8535"\w* \w and|strong="H8034"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w*, fearing God \w and|strong="H8034"\w* shunning \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.
\w He|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H3205"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* owned 7,000 \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, 3,000 \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*, 500 \w yoke|strong="H6776"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, 500 female donkeys, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w large|strong="H1419"\w* number \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w servants|strong="H5657"\w*. Job \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w greatest|strong="H1419"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w East|strong="H6924"\w*.

Job’s \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w would|strong="H6213"\w* \w take|strong="H1980"\w* turns holding \w feasts|strong="H4960"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* \w homes|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w would|strong="H6213"\w* \w invite|strong="H7121"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* sisters \w to|strong="H1980"\w* eat \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w feasting|strong="H4960"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w over|strong="H5927"\w*, Job \w would|strong="H6213"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w purify|strong="H2398"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*, \w rising|strong="H7925"\w* \w early|strong="H7925"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* Job \w thought|strong="H3824"\w*, “\w Perhaps|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w cursed|strong="H1288"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w*.” \w This|strong="H6213"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* Job’s regular \w practice|strong="H6213"\w*. Satan’s First Attack

\w One|strong="H1121"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w present|strong="H3320"\w* \w themselves|strong="H3320"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w* \f + \fr 1:6 \ft That is, the Accuser or the Adversary; here and throughout Job 1\f* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

“Where \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6030"\w* \w come|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H1980"\w*?” \w said|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w*. “\w From|strong="H1980"\w* \w roaming|strong="H7751"\w* \w through|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth,” \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w walking|strong="H1980"\w* \w back|strong="H1980"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w forth|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w it|strong="H1980"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w*, “\w Have|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w considered|strong="H7760"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* Job? \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H7760"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* earth \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H7451"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w blameless|strong="H8535"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w fears|strong="H3373"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* shuns \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.”

\w Satan|strong="H7854"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w Does|strong="H3068"\w* Job \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w nothing|strong="H2600"\w*?

\w Have|strong="H3027"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w placed|strong="H6555"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hedge|strong="H7753"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w side|strong="H5439"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* owns? \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w possessions|strong="H4735"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w increased|strong="H6555"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w stretch|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w strike|strong="H5060"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w surely|strong="H3808"\w* \w curse|strong="H1288"\w* \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.”

“Very \w well|strong="H5973"\w*,” \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w*. “\w Everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w but|strong="H7535"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* must \w not|strong="H3318"\w* \w lay|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w himself|strong="H3027"\w*.” \w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. Job Loses His Children and Possessions

\w One|strong="H1121"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w while|strong="H1961"\w* Job’s \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* eating \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w oldest|strong="H1060"\w* brother’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*,

\w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* reported \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Job: “\w While|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w plowing|strong="H2790"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* donkeys \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w grazing|strong="H7462"\w* nearby,

\w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Sabeans|strong="H7614"\w* swooped \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w*. \w They|strong="H6310"\w* \w put|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \w to|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w I|strong="H5288"\w* \w alone|strong="H4422"\w* \w have|strong="H5288"\w* \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* \w to|strong="H6310"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w*!”

\w While|strong="H5750"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w was|strong="H5288"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w*, \w another|strong="H2088"\w* \w messenger|strong="H5046"\w* \w came|strong="H5307"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w reported|strong="H5046"\w*: “\w The|strong="H4480"\w* fire \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*. \w It|strong="H1696"\w* \w burned|strong="H1197"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w consumed|strong="H1197"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w alone|strong="H4480"\w* \w have|strong="H5288"\w* \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w*!”

\w While|strong="H5750"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H5288"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w*, \w another|strong="H2088"\w* \w messenger|strong="H5046"\w* \w came|strong="H7969"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w reported|strong="H5046"\w*: “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* \w formed|strong="H7760"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w bands|strong="H7218"\w*, \w raided|strong="H6584"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w*. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w alone|strong="H4422"\w* \w have|strong="H5288"\w* \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*!”

\w While|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w was|strong="H1004"\w* \w still|strong="H5704"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w*, \w another|strong="H2088"\w* messenger \w came|strong="H1323"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* reported: “\w Your|strong="H5704"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* eating \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H8354"\w* \w oldest|strong="H1060"\w* brother’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*,

\w when|strong="H5307"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H2009"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1419"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* swept \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w struck|strong="H5060"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* four \w corners|strong="H6438"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. \w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w collapsed|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w people|strong="H5288"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w alone|strong="H4422"\w* \w have|strong="H5288"\w* \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*!”

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* Job \w stood|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, \w tore|strong="H7167"\w* \w his|strong="H7167"\w* \w robe|strong="H4598"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w shaved|strong="H1494"\w* \w his|strong="H7167"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*. He \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* ground \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w worshiped|strong="H7812"\w*,

saying: “\w Naked|strong="H6174"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* mother’s womb, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w naked|strong="H6174"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*. \w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w*. \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.”

\w In|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w Job|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w charge|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* wrongdoing.
